subtitle: The carrot and orange really complement one another in this delicious chilled summer soup.

method.text: Melt the butter or margarine in a large saucepan. Stir in the onion, carrots and potato. Cover and cook gently for 5 min, stirring frequently. Add chervil and stock. Bring to the boil then reduce heat and simmer for about 30 min or until vegetables are tender. Allow to cool.
Blend the soup in batches in a blender or food processor. Stir in the orange juice and seasoning to taste.
Chill the soup. Add a swirl of yogurt or cream.

title: Chilled carrot and orange soup
